title: Home country
creator_credit: Julie Mongta-Saunders, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Julie Mongta/Saunders traces the movement of her family over time, both geographically and generationally. Though scattered, this family have a strong connection, both to each other and the land of their birth, intensified by the sense of ‘coming home’.
creator_credit_for_label: Julie Mongta-Saunders, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
